description:
Image upscaling up to 16x pixels.

Gigapixel is a powerful desktop application that uses advanced AI to upscale photos, graphics, and artwork up to 6x while preserving detail and clarity.
With intelligent auto settings that adapt to your image, it delivers high-fidelity results for creatives and professionals alike.
Hello!
It’s been a while since our last patch for Gigapixel AI, and this update brings important improvements to align with our latest company changes. While this release represents a significant shift for all our users, we’re excited about the future and what’s ahead. We’re committed to carrying Gigapixel’s legacy forward with our new Studio release.
Gigapixel AI will continue to receive occasional minor patch updates, but new AI models and major features will be introduced in the Studio versions of our desktop apps.
Thank you!
Esther H.
Associate Product Manager
Changelog:
- Handle in-app upgrading to Topaz Gigapixel Studio
- Fixed Intel Mac incompatibility message
- Added ability to copy cloud process ID even when process fails
- Fixed various button sizes
- Fixed various text around app
- Automatic lensfun update
- (v8.4.4) Fixed “New Topaz Gigapixel” button workflow being in a loop
- (v8.4.4) Fixed Update button continuously being active
- (v8.4.4) Fixed In-app Updater showing 9.9.9
- (v8.4.4) Fixed Pasting images straight into the app not working
- (v8.4.4) Fixed not being able to free seats
